Package net.tangly.erp.ledger.domain

Class AccountEntry

java.lang.Object
net.tangly.erp.ledger.domain.AccountEntry
All Implemented Interfaces:
net.tangly.core.HasTags
public class AccountEntry extends Object implements net.tangly.core.HasTags
The account entry class models one booking in an account of a double entry accounting system. The class is immutable.
